lsystem

Class CSGrammar

  • java.lang.Object
    • lsystem.CSGrammar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Grammar

    public class CSGrammar
extends java.lang.Object
implements Grammar
    Implements Grammar interface CSGrammar class that provides convenience method for working with l-systems in particular context sensitive grammars where expected input is a context string. There is ability to ignore certain characters (eg []0-9) when determining context.
    Author:
    Martin Prout
